info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 2:38PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Christian, southeastern Caldwell and northeastern Trigg Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 138 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cobb, or 11 miles northeast of Cadiz, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Christian, southeastern Caldwell and northeastern Trigg Counties, including the following locations... Hawkins. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
